attributes.action: Please stop the military coup happening right now in Myanmar.
attributes.additional_details: Historically UK Government has been extensively involved in Myanmar that pre-dated its independence. Your help along with other members of the UN in needed to draw attention to these very recent events.
attributes.background: The democratically elected leaders including State Counsellor Aung San Suu Kyi, President Win Myint along with senior government officials, and the members of parliament have been detained by the military.
